metadata.title: CVE-2021-38508 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: By displaying a form validity message in the correct location at the sametime as a permission prompt (such as for geolocation), the validity messagecould have obscured the prompt, resulting in the user potentially beingtricked into granting the permission. This vulnerability affects Firefox <94, Thunderbird < 91.3, and Firefox ESR < 91.3.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
